Question: Asus Computer International CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
ASUS

Zenbook Duo (2024)

 - World’s first 14-inch dual screen OLED laptop
 - Two 14-inch touchscreens
 - Traditional laptop keyboard with trackpad
 - Lightweight at 2.98 pounds and .57 inches thick
 - Starting price of $1,499.99

Zenscreen Fold OLED MQ17QH

 - Portable folding display design

NUC Mini-PCs

 - New range of compact computing solutions

ROG (Republic of Gamers)

 - New exclusive performance-focused products unveiled
